name: Elaine W. HARBISON v. WORKMEN'S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD and Reuben H. Donnelley Appeal of Reuben H. DONNELLEY
name_abbreviation: Harbison v. Workmen's Compensation Appeal Board

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: Elaine W. HARBISON v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD and Reuben H. Donnelley Appeal of Reuben H. DONNELLEY

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
This appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Michael D. Sherman, Roy F. Walters, Jr., Joseph F. Grochmal, Pittsburgh, for appellants.
Alan H. Perer, Nelson B. Gaugler, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
526 A.2d 746
Elaine W. HARBISON v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD and Reuben H. Donnelley Appeal of Reuben H. DONNELLEY
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 27, 1987.
Decided May 21, 1987.
Michael D. Sherman, Roy F. Walters, Jr., Joseph F. Grochmal, Pittsburgh, for appellants.
Alan H. Perer, Nelson B. Gaugler, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
